message: Land of the free and no regulations, this is what you get. By law you must have insurance and registration on your car. But phone Apps, not a chance. Wait till the databases of collected mobile phone numbers get compiled from hacking to spam you with this crap - and then threaten you with it. The virus threat is huge and of course the ultimate - RansomWare, threaten you with bad reviews unless you pay up. This folks, is just the beginning of the end of smart phone freedom. And then the far right will really want to monitor your smart phone. Afterall, if Yelp can track you, why can't the gvt? Many Regulations and legal monitoring of phones is only when it suits extreme views (left or right). And this isn't going to be just an American problem, but global.Organized crime gangs and hackers will have a field day. Those spam txt messages you receive (cuz you probably posted your mobile number on Facebook) is already in the millions of txt per day. With Yelp, it will jump to 100 million per day. And wait until the company gets hacked. Game over.

Right?? Even with any archaic custom, you'd think the fact that makeup alters appearance would be gleaned somehow along the way during the process of living. WAY too much weird here. Someone did a terrible job raising this man, in any case and from many angles.

Sarah Ward I feel sorry for you dear, you are lost in stress hormones, and missing the point entirely, esp with a hormone like cortisol, which is elevated in ATHLETES and those who are more ACTIVE, such as a NATURAL animal in its NATURAL environment, the open sea...swimming THOUSANDS of more miles per month, than an ENSLAVED being, being kept in a TINY tank, with barely enough room to swim enough to release an endorphine, let alone a hormone that is NORMALLY elevated by a NATURAL LIFE, in a NATURAL ENVIRONMENT....ya know genius, my stress hormones would go down if I was kept in a tiny tank and had nothing to worry about and nowhere to go, however, I would not call what I was doing LIVING....again, you are attempting to defend the indefensible, warping the use of biochemistry to fit your PORPOISES....when you are ready to have lower cortisol levels via the extreme adrenal exhaustion put upon you from being held a captive prisoner and tortured every day, let me know....I know some guys in the plexiglass business
